text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --
AUSTRALIA, June 10 - COAL - QUEENSLAND - Abbot Point - Berth vacant. 5 Vessels due by 26/6. No delays.
Hay Point - Maintenance shutdown 29/5-9/6 for berth 1 and 10/8/7 for berth 2. Berth vacant. 9 Vessels due by 27/6. No delays.

Dalrymple Bay - Expected operational from 1800 hrs 10/6 after maintenance shutdown. German Creek mine expected to close for maintenance for 2-3 weeks. Curragh strike continues until 12/6, when decision will be taken whether to continue or return. At Gordonstone, notice given of 72 hour rolling strikes from 12/6. 14 Vessels due by 26/6. No delays.
Gladstone, R.G. Tanna - 1 Vessel loading, waiting. 19 Vessels due 25/7. No delays.
Barney Point - Berth vacant. 3 Vessels due by 23/7. No delays.
Brisbane - One vessel loading, 4 due by 27/6. No delays.

NEW SOUTH WALES - Newcastle - More than 30 vessels waiting. June stems are 5.3 mt (a carryover from May 2.2 mt). Similar carryovers expected for July, with average of 11 days delay expected for next 2 months.
Kooragang - 2 Vessels loading, 10 waiting. 17 Vessels due by 24/6, 11 days delay expected.
Dykes 4+5 - 2 Vessels loading, 8 waiting. 13 vessels due by 24/6, 10-11 days delay expected.
Port Kembla - Coal terminal lease to be restructured to give lower tonnage costs and longer lease period. Berth vacant. 27 Vessels due by 25/8. No delays.
IRON ORE - WESTERN AUSTRALIA - Dampier - Parker Point - 1 Vessel loading, 5 anchored. 2 Vessels due by 11/6.
East Intercourse Island - 1 Vessel loading, 3 anchored. 3 vessels due by 12/6.
Dampier line-up - 16 Vessels due by 23/6 of which 10 for Parker Point, 6 for East Intercourse Island.
Port Walcott - Maintenance shutdown for approx. 6 days at Robe River iron around 16/6. One vessel loading. 9 Vessels due by 26/6.

Port Hedland - Mt. Newman (Nelson Point) - Due to occasional shortage of Mt. Newman lump and fines and yandi fines, iron ore vessels may experience some berthing/loading delays or be forced to berth out of turn. A-Berth - 1 Vessel loading, 4 anchored. B-Berth - 1 Vessel berthing, 4 anchored. Due to cargo shortages as above, shippers unable to give accurate prospects for following vessels. 10 Vessels anchored, 3 due by 14/6. 10 Other vessels scheduled by 10/7, no eta received. 1 vessel loading, 2 anchored, 1 due 11/6. 1 Other vessel due 23/6.
